roleset.name: give, as to a god/dess
roleset.note: SACRIFICE-V NOTES: Comparison with 'give'. Member of Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1. (from sacrifice.01-v)
SACRIFICE-N NOTES: Based on verb entry sacrifice.01; corresponds to Vncls contribute-13.2-1-1. (from sacrifice.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: Perhaps he-1 is willing *trace*-1 to sacrifice to the arbitrage trader some small profit in order to get quick and certain execution of his large trade.
example.arg: in order to get quick and certain execution of his large trade

example.name: unmentioned god(dess)
example.text: Making computers smaller often means *trace* sacrificing memory .

example.name: with locative
example.text: John sacrifices at the altar of Bill Gates.
example.arg: at the altar of Bill Gates

example.name: with purpose, within LVC
example.text: The USSR made a great sacrifice in the war to win over German invaders .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: We meet him in his sacrifice of himself to the Father on our behalf.
